settingsPage.appearanceDesc: Customize how Quantum X looks on your device. Theme settings can be accessed from the header.
settingsPage.languageDesc: Language settings can be changed from the dropdown in the header.

copyPage.riskManagementDesc: Copy trading carries risks. Set position limits and stop-losses to protect your capital.

correlationPage.title: Correlation Matrix
correlationPage.description: Analyze asset correlations for portfolio diversification
correlationPage.strongPositiveDesc: Assets move together. High concentration risk.

allocationPage.title: Portfolio Allocation
allocationPage.description: Optimize capital allocation across strategies using risk budgeting
allocationPage.riskNotice1: Past performance does not guarantee future results
allocationPage.riskNotice2: Correlations may change during market stress
allocationPage.riskNotice3: Consider tail risk and black swan events
allocationPage.riskNotice4: Regularly rebalance to maintain target allocations
allocationPage.riskNotice5: Monitor drawdowns and adjust risk budget accordingly

apiKeysPage.title: API Key Management
apiKeysPage.description: Create and manage API keys for programmatic access
apiKeysPage.copyKeyWarning: Copy this key now. You won't be able to see it again.
apiKeysPage.name: Name
apiKeysPage.noApiKeysDescription: Create your first API key to enable programmatic access to the trading platform.
apiKeysPage.securityTip1: Never share your API keys or commit them to version control
apiKeysPage.securityTip2: Use the minimum required permissions for each key
apiKeysPage.securityTip3: Rotate keys regularly and revoke unused keys
apiKeysPage.securityTip4: Consider setting expiration dates for temporary access
apiKeysPage.securityTip5: Use IP whitelisting for production keys when possible

arbitragePage.title: Arbitrage Scanner
arbitragePage.noOpportunitiesHint: Try lowering the minimum spread filter

attributionPage.title: Performance Attribution
attributionPage.description: Analyze return sources by factor and strategy
attributionPage.factorAttributionDesc: Breaks down returns by systematic risk factors. Positive contributions indicate profitable exposure to that factor. Market Beta represents general market movement, while Momentum, Value, and Volatility represent style tilts.
attributionPage.strategyAttributionDesc: Shows how each strategy contributed to total portfolio return. Contribution = Strategy Return x Allocation Weight. High return with low contribution means the strategy had small allocation.

exchangeComparePage.title: Exchange Comparison
exchangeComparePage.selectAssetHint: Select an asset to view detailed comparison

featureImportancePage.title: Feature Importance
featureImportancePage.importanceDesc: Higher % = feature has more influence on predictions overall
featureImportancePage.shapValueDesc: Positive = pushes prediction up (bullish). Negative = pushes down (bearish)
featureImportancePage.interactionsDesc: Strong interactions mean features work together to influence predictions

infrastructurePage.title: Infrastructure
infrastructurePage.description: SSL certificates, CDN edges, and service health

positionSizingPage.title: Position Sizing Calculator
positionSizingPage.description: Calculate optimal position sizes using various risk management methods
positionSizingPage.fixedFractionalDesc: The most common method. Risk a fixed percentage (typically 1-2%) of your account per trade. Simple and effective for most traders.
positionSizingPage.kellyCriterionDesc: Mathematically optimal bet size. Maximizes long-term growth but can be aggressive. Requires accurate win rate and payoff estimates.
positionSizingPage.halfKellyDesc: Conservative Kelly. Uses 50% of optimal Kelly size. Reduces volatility while still capturing most of the growth benefit.
positionSizingPage.percentVolatilityDesc: Adjusts position size based on asset volatility. Lower positions in volatile markets, larger in calm markets.
positionSizingPage.fixedRatioDesc: Position size based on profit delta. Increases size as account grows.

replayPage.title: Trade Replay
replayPage.description: Replay historical trades for analysis and learning

scannerPage.title: Market Scanner
scannerPage.description: Scan for trading opportunities across all assets

strategyGeneratorPage.title: Strategy Generator
strategyGeneratorPage.typeTrendFollowingDesc: Ride market trends using moving averages and momentum
strategyGeneratorPage.typeMeanReversionDesc: Trade price deviations back to average
strategyGeneratorPage.aiWillCreateStrategies: AI will create optimized strategies based on your configuration
strategyGeneratorPage.aiOptimizing: AI is optimizing parameters and running backtests

watchlistPage.title: Watchlists
watchlistPage.description: Track your favorite assets with price alerts

modelBacktestPage.title: Model Backtester
modelBacktestPage.clickWindowToView: Click on a window to view details

mtfPage.title: Multi-Timeframe Analysis
mtfPage.description: Synchronized charts across multiple timeframes for trend confirmation
mtfPage.bullishHint: Multiple timeframes showing bullish momentum. Consider long entries on pullbacks to support levels.
mtfPage.bearishHint: Multiple timeframes showing bearish momentum. Consider short entries on rallies to resistance levels.
mtfPage.neutralHint: Timeframes are showing conflicting signals. Wait for clearer alignment before taking positions.

notificationsPage.backupCompleteMsg: Daily backup of trading data completed successfully

optimizerPage.title: Parameter Optimizer
optimizerPage.description: Find optimal strategy parameters using grid search optimization
optimizerPage.readyToOptimizeDesc: Configure your parameter ranges and optimization objective, then click "Start Optimization" to find the best parameters for your strategy.
optimizerPage.overfittingWarningDesc: Optimized parameters may overfit to historical data. Always validate results with:
